    [D3] 8931. 제로

    최대 1 분 소요

    8931. 제로

    Code

    import java.util.*;
 
public class Solution {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
         
        int T = sc.nextInt();
         
        for(int tc=1; tc<=T; tc++) {
            int K = sc.nextInt();
            Stack<Integer> stack = new Stack<>();
             
            int temp = 0;
             
            for(int i=0; i<K; i++) {
                temp = sc.nextInt();
                if(temp==0) {
                    stack.pop();
                }
                else {
                    stack.add(temp);
                }
                     
            }
             
             
            int sum = 0;
            while(!stack.isEmpty()) {
                sum+=stack.pop();
            }
 
             
            System.out.println("#"+tc+" "+sum);
        }
    }
}

    카테고리: Swea

    업데이트: February 7, 2020
